refnamediv.refpurpose: print a calendar for one or more years

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: yearcal prints the calendar for year. year can be negative or positive, and is a Proleptic Gregorian year number.

yearcal outputs TeleType Model 37 control sequences for boldface and underline, which can be interpreted by less1 or converted to your terminal's own control sequences with ul1. The first column is Sunday, and months are printed on the right-hand side.

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: yearcal was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's libtai toolset in 1999.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
